title:
Generating Functions of Generalized Simplicial Polytopic Numbers and
  $(s,t)$-Derivatives of Partial Theta Function
abstract:
In this article, the generalized simplicial polytopic numbers
P$_{n}^{d}(s,t)$, defined on generalized Fibonacci polynomials with parameters
$s,t$, are introduced. Moreover, we obtain beautiful generating functions of
the numbers P$_{n}^{d}(s,t)$, which are related to the $(s,t)$-derivatives of
the Partial Theta function $\Theta_{0}(x,q)$.
